tasks.title: Test All Navigation Flows
tasks.description: Verify that all screen transitions work correctly, including the bottom navigation, search screen navigation, and all new screens (Profile, My Bookings, Payment Methods, Legal & Privacy, Terms of Service, Become a Host).
tasks.details: Test the complete user journey from home screen through all major features. Ensure back navigation works properly and no screens get stuck.
tasks.testStrategy: Manual testing on different devices and screen sizes. Test edge cases like rapid navigation and app state changes.

tasks.title: Verify Form Validations
tasks.description: Test all form validations in the app, especially the Become a Host multi-step form, Profile screen, and any other input forms.
tasks.details: Ensure all required fields are properly validated, optional fields work correctly, and error messages are displayed appropriately.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with empty inputs, invalid data, and edge cases. Verify validation messages are user-friendly.

tasks.title: Test Become a Host Multi-Step Form
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of the Become a Host form including all steps: Personal Info, Business Info, Vehicle Info (Optional), Documents, and Review.
tasks.details: Test the conditional logic for business types, multi-selection for vehicle types, country code selection, and all the improvements we made.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each step individually and as a complete flow. Verify all conditional requirements work correctly.

tasks.title: Add Loading States
tasks.description: Implement loading states for all async operations throughout the app to improve user experience.
tasks.details: Add loading indicators for API calls, image loading, form submissions, and navigation transitions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with slow network conditions and verify loading states provide good user feedback.

tasks.title: Implement Error Handling
tasks.description: Add comprehensive error handling for network failures, API errors, and other potential issues.
tasks.details: Create user-friendly error messages and recovery mechanisms for common error scenarios.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with network disconnection, invalid API responses, and other error conditions.

tasks.title: Add Unit Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for critical components including form validations, navigation logic, and business logic.
tasks.details: Focus on testing the search functionality, filter logic, form validations, and data processing functions.
tasks.testStrategy: Use Flutter's testing framework to create comprehensive test coverage for critical paths.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance
tasks.description: Optimize the app for better performance, especially for large lists and image loading.
tasks.details: Implement lazy loading, image caching, and optimize widget rebuilds for better performance.
tasks.testStrategy: Profile the app on different devices and measure performance metrics.

tasks.title: Add Screen Transitions
tasks.description: Implement smooth animations and transitions between screens to enhance user experience.
tasks.details: Add page transitions, hero animations for car images, and micro-interactions throughout the app.
tasks.testStrategy: Test animations on different devices and ensure they don't impact performance.

tasks.title: Implement Dark Mode
tasks.description: Add dark mode support throughout the app with proper theming and color schemes.
tasks.details: Create a comprehensive theme system that supports both light and dark modes with appropriate colors.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dark mode on different screens and ensure good contrast and readability.

tasks.title: Add Accessibility Features
tasks.description: Implement accessibility features including screen reader support, high contrast mode, and scalable text.
tasks.details: Add semantic labels, proper focus management, and support for accessibility tools.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with screen readers and accessibility tools to ensure compliance.

tasks.title: Create Onboarding Flow
tasks.description: Design and implement an onboarding flow for new users to introduce app features.
tasks.details: Create engaging onboarding screens that explain key features and guide users through initial setup.
tasks.testStrategy: Test onboarding flow with new users and gather feedback on clarity and effectiveness.

tasks.title: Test Different Screen Sizes
tasks.description: Test the app on various screen sizes and orientations to ensure responsive design.
tasks.details: Test on phones, tablets, and different aspect ratios to ensure the UI adapts properly.
tasks.testStrategy: Use Flutter's device testing tools and test on physical devices with different screen sizes.

tasks.title: Verify Icon Imports
tasks.description: Check that all icons are properly imported and displayed correctly throughout the app.
tasks.details: Ensure all Material Icons and custom icons are properly imported and displayed without errors.
tasks.testStrategy: Systematically check each screen for icon display issues and verify imports.

tasks.title: Backend Integration Preparation
tasks.description: Prepare the app for backend integration by setting up API service classes and data models.
tasks.details: Create service classes for authentication, car data, bookings, and payments. Set up proper data models.
tasks.testStrategy: Create mock API responses and test the integration points.

tasks.title: Documentation and Code Review
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation and perform a final code review of all implemented features.
tasks.details: Document the codebase, create user guides, and ensure code quality and maintainability.
tasks.testStrategy: Review code for best practices, create documentation, and prepare for deployment.

metadata.description: Core development tasks for STER car rental app based on PRD requirements
